articles.title: How Pandemics End - The New York Times
articles.description: An infectious outbreak can conclude in more ways than one, historians say. But for whom does it end, and who gets to decide?
articles.content:
When will the Covid-19 pandemic end? And how?
According to historians, pandemics typically have two types of endings: the medical, which occurs when the incidence and death rates plummet, and the social, when the epidemic of fear about the disease wanes.
Wh… [+10932 chars]
